channel.title: CVE Feed for Brian Batt -- Insert or Embed Articulate Content into WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brian Batt -- Insert or Embed Articulate Content into WordPress

item.title: CVE-2023-50824|2024-08-02T22:23:43.607Z -- brian%20batt -- insert%20or%20embed%20articulate%20content%20into%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Brian Batt Insert or Embed Articulate Content into WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Insert or Embed Articulate Content into WordPress: from n/a through 4.3000000021.
